Mandatory.P: (1) * Replace leftmost and rightmost char -(hyphen) of superscript matter, into minus
(2) * Replace all variations of degree into 'degree' symbol
(3) * Remove unwanted blank lines
(4) * Replace underlined 'plus' sign(s) with plus/minus symbol(s)
(5) * Replace underlined 'Greater Than' symbol(s) with 'Greater Than or Equal To' symbol(s)
(6) * Replace underlined 'Less Than' symbol(s) with 'Less Than or Equal To' symbol(s)
(7) * Replace 'x' with 'multiplication' symbol
(8) * Remove space(s) before tab
(9) * Remove space(s) after tab
(10) * Remove tab(s) before paragraph mark
(11) * Remove tab(s) after paragraph mark
(12) * Remove space(s) before paragraph mark
(13) * Remove space(s) after paragraph mark
(14) * Replace multiple space(s) with single space
(22) * Remove space(s) before comma
(23) * Remove space(s) before semicolon
(25) * Remove space(s) before closing parenthesis
(26) * Remove space(s) after opening parenthesis
(29) * Remove space before Celsius or Fahrenheit sign
(38) * Remove unwanted section/page/column Breaks

Optional.P: (15) * Change 'Em Dash' with --- (triple hyphen) and 'En Dash' with -- (double hyphen)
(16) * Replace 'single hyphen' inside page range/number range with 'double hyphen'
(17) * Change 'double hyphen' inside page range/number range into 'single hyphen'
(18) * Change smart quote(s) to straight quote(s)
(19) * Change straight quote(s) to smart quote(s)
(20) * Change three consecutive dots to Ellipsis(...)
(21) * Change hyphen (with space both side) into En Dash (with space both side)
(24) * Remove space(s) before period
(27) * Remove comma from digits
(28) * Remove space(s) before % sign
(30) * Convert tab mark(s) to standard form
(31) * Add 'space' before and after 'equal sign'
(32) * Move 'period' from outside closing double quote(s) to inside
(33) * Move 'comma' from outside closing double quote(s) to inside
(34) * Convert 'direction' sign(s) to symbol(s)
(35) * Convert 'hard return' mark(s) to standard form
(36) * Insert 'En Space' in COMMON SI and Metric units
(37) * Insert 'En Space' for COMPLEX (>550 units) SI and Metric units
(39) * Replace Em dash with spaces on both sides to En dash with spaces on both sides
(40) * Replace --- (Triple hyphens) with spaces on both sides to En dash with spaces on both sides
(41) * Replace --- (Triple hyphens) without spaces on both sides to En dash with spaces on both sides
(42) * Replace -- (Double hyphens) with spaces on both sides to En dash with spaces on both sides
(43) * Insert 'Non-breaking Space' for COMPLEX (>550 units) SI and Metric units
(44) * Remove header and footer information
(45) * Remove space before superscript footnote/endnote citations
(46) * Remove Optional Hyphen Between Word
(47) * Convert 'direction' arrow(s) to symbol(s)
(48) * Delete empty line breaks
(49) * convert greek small letter mu (Âµ) to micro (Âµ)
(50) * Convert Elipsis to DOT with space
(51) * Convert DOI: xx.xxxx/ to https://doi.org/xx.xxxx/
(52) * Insert MS-Word comment in place of query tag
(53) * Insert space between ")("
(54) * Remove Non Braking Spaces with normal space
(55) * Insert space in non spaced float citations
(56) * Highlight List Paragraph in Tables.
(57) * Convert prime to apos
(58) * Listing numbers to be converted as text during filtration

Validation.P: (1) * Alert if Hidden text found in manuscript
(3) * Alert if wrong hyperlink applied to numbered citation.
(7) * Alert to check the space between initials in reference authors
(11) * Alert if Volume and Page is missing in Periodical/Journal reference
(12) * Alert if Publisher missing in Book Reference
(13) * Alert if Book Reference containing URL
(16) * Alert for double occurrence of year and page range marking in references
(17) * Alert to match reference style with style-sheet
(24) * Alert if there is no space between text and inline equations
(25) * Alert to check all table heading is coming in bold
(26) * Alert to compare Email address with PTS
(27) * Alert to compare corresponding author with PTS.
(37) * Validation for Fundref Linking based on Keywords

Mandatory.P: (749) * Change Article Title in sentence case
(750) * Change Article Title in Title case
(796) * Delete Keywords from the file.
(277) * Insertion of non-breaking space before all commonly occurring units
(324) * Convert P Value To Italic
(326) * Insert Thin-space in thousand Digit
(922) * TableCaption: Table caption should be Title case and remove period from the end of caption
(1002) * Reference heading: Update heading as 'References'.
(1620) * APHS: Capitalize and italicize P.
(1703) * Table caption end not required dot
(1879) * To remove zero before the decimal in p value.
(1907) * Remove trade mark (TM) and registered mark (R)
(1935) * References Alphabetical Sorting (New)
(1947) * Insert normal space in math operator.
(1955) * Change minus or hyphen to ndash in figure and table citation.
(1956) * Unit should not be in italic (Like Mmg,Âµg,Âµg/ML,Âµm,Âµl,Âµmol).
(1957) * As per eMFC guidelines, figure subparts are not required to be cross linked.
(1958) * Statement of significance should be always sentence case.
(1985) * Sex or gender place the query on the article title
(1989) * Replace i.e.,/i.e. to ie, or e.g.,/e.g. to eg

(1990) * One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten should be in numerals when appearing with â€œday/days, hour/hours, minute/minutes, second/seconds, millisecond/milliseconds, month/months, week/weeks, year/years, kg, cm, dL, km, L, m, Âµg, ÂµL, Âµm, mL, mm, m2, cm2, mm2â€ except when the number is appearing at the beginning of the sentence.
(509) * Comman eMFC points
(701) * Insert % mark in range. (68-80%) to (68%-80%)

Please choose a role from the below list for this author: Conceptualization, Data curation, Formal analysis, Funding acquisition, Investigation, Methodology, Project administration, Resources, Software, Supervision, Validation, Visualization, Writing - original draft, Writing - review & editing.

Category.name: CITATIONS
Category.Query: [CIT004] Table(s) [] was/were provided, but not cited in the text. Please provide a citation for it/them.
[CIT005] Figures or tables were not cited in the text. Please check that the citations suggested are in the appropriate place, and correct if necessary.
[CIT006] The citation â€˜____â€™ has been changed to match the author name in the reference list. Please check here and in subsequent occurrences, and correct if necessary.
[CIT007] The citation â€˜____â€™ has been changed to match the date in the reference list. Please check here and in subsequent occurrences, and correct if necessary.

[CIT009] If there are fewer than seven authors for a reference citation, please add all their names; if there are seven or more authors, please supply the first three authorsâ€™ names, followed by â€˜et al.â€™
[CIT002] The reference â€˜____â€™ is only cited in the abstract and not in the text. Please introduce a citation in the text.
[CIT003] Tables should not be cited in the abstract. A citation for Table ___ has been inserted instead in the text. Please check, and correct if necessary.
[CIT011] Please cite footnote â€˜__â€™.

[CIT010] We have changed all the citations of Jones 1999 to Jones, 1999a,b, because in the reference list Jones 1999a and 1999b are mentioned as separate references. Please review and correct the citations in the text if necessary.
[CIT001] Figures should not be cited in the abstract. A citation for Fig. ___ has been inserted instead in the text. Please check, and correct if necessary.

Category.name: COI
Category.Query: [COI005] A conflict of interest was mentioned in both the Competing Interest form and within the main article text. Please add the statement you prefer to the Declaration Competing Interest section and remove it from the main article text.

[COI003] A competing interest was declared, but no supporting statement was provided. As a result, we've used the conflict of interest statement that was provided in the manuscript. Please review the conflict of interest statement under the Declaration Competing Interest section and correct if necessary.

[COI002] No response around conflict of interest was provided in the Declaration of Interests form. Hence we have stated that there are no competing interests. Please review the Declaration Competing Interest section and correct if necessary.

[COI001] A conflict of interest was mentioned in both the Declaration of Interests form and within the manuscript. The statement has now been provided in the Declaration of Competing Interest section. Please review the conflict of interest statement under the Declaration Competing Interest section and correct if necessary.
[COI004] A conflict of interest was mentioned during submission, however details of this are missing. Please provide the conflict of interest statement.
[COI006] We have found a competing interest statement in your main article text and have moved this to the Declaration Competing Interest section. Please review and correct if necessary.

Category.name: COPYRIGHT
Category.Query: [CPY001] Note: The content published on Sci-Hub infringes the copyright of the publisher from which it was obtained and therefore links to it cannot be featured in Elsevier content. As a result the URLs linked to Sci-Hub have been deleted.
